ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes representing the measurement of a patient's systolic blood pressure. The codes used are LOINC codes.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify the measurement or observation of the systolic blood pressure in a patient. Using the Quality Data Model, this data element maps to the Physical exam, finding category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes representing the measurement of systolic blood pressure using LOINC code system.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude any codes which do not represent an observation or measurement of systolic blood pressure in LOINC code system)
